body.p:
You can use the Improve Readability action from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Rewrite category to ask the AI Positron to improve the readability inside a DITA topic's selected content.

The AI action Improve Readability is incredibly useful for end users as it significantly enhances the readability and comprehension of written content. By employing advanced algorithms and language processing techniques, this AI action simplifies complex sentences, replaces jargon with more accessible terms, and adjusts the overall structure to make the text more concise and coherent. It helps individuals effortlessly understand and engage with various types of content, including articles, reports, emails, and even academic papers. End users can save time, avoid confusion, and seamlessly absorb information by using the Improve Readability AI action, ultimately enhancing their overall reading experience.
Open the topic, select the entire content and invoke the Improve Readability action.
